channel.title: Please help i get error on [508] client
channel.description:
Please help. when start my server it works.... when i start client it works...
but when i log in to play ... it dont work... it comes up with this error
Error: T3 - true,0,104,1401869149,-48544502,-1125057849,-1186152368 | RSString:8 55 Class21:188 Class21:520 Class61:337 client:767 Applet_Sub1:485 Applet_Sub1:15 6 java.lang.Thread.run | java.lang.RuntimeException error_game_crash Shutdown complete - clean:true
please help me.... my mate can join the server with the same client as me we have same java and everything please help me :( from pkzima1

item.title: Please help i get error on [508] client
item.dc:creator: @darkman210 darkman210
item.description:
@darkman210 wrote:

open up your client folder and look in class21-line 188 , class 21-line 520, class61-line 337, client-line 767, applet_sub1-line 485, applet_sub1-line 15. and see what it says

Read full topic
item.source: Please help i get error on [508] client
